INFO_TEXT:
Welcome to Zionn - your reliable partner in the field of transport and logistics solutions. We specialize in transporting goods up to 3.5 tons throughout Europe, ensuring safety and reliability at every stage of delivery.

Our Services:

Transportation up to 3.5 Tons: Zionn offers high-quality cargo transportation, complying with all norms and standards, along with a full guarantee of safety.

Express Deliveries: We understand the value of time, which is why our express deliveries allow you to promptly deliver goods to the necessary points.

Cargo Licensing and Insurance: We possess all necessary licenses for cargo transportation and offer comprehensive insurance for your cargo, providing you with maximum protection.

GPS Tracking: Modern GPS tracking technologies provide you with complete visibility of your cargo's movement in real-time, ensuring accuracy and punctuality of delivery.

Office in Krakow: Our main office is located in Krakow, allowing us to efficiently serve clients throughout the region and provide the highest level of service.

Our mission is to make your logistics as simple and reliable as possible. Contact us today and trust the professionals at Zionn for efficient cargo transportation.
